{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetRipperLevel}} '''A_SetRipperLevel''' (int ''level'')
Changes the calling actor's {{Property|RipperLevel|ripper level}} to ''level''. This is '''not''' a property that can be used with expressions.
Projectiles have the greatest effect with this, as long as they're {{flag|RIPPER|RIPPERs}}. The projectile can rip through any monster if its ripper level is within the monster's {{Property|RipLevelMin|minimum}} and {{Property|RipLevelMax|maximum}} ripper levels or equal to the monster's own ripper level. I.e. a monster has a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 5 with a direct ripping level of 10, then ripper levels of 1 through 5 OR 10 can successfully rip them.
